SOFTWAREUPDATENOTIFICATIONMANAGER(8) System Manager's Manual SOFTWAREUPDATENOTIFICATIONMANAGER(8)

NAME

SoftwareUpdateNotificationManager —
macOS software update

DESCRIPTION

SoftwareUpdateNotificationManager is a system daemon that manages displaying notifications related to macOS software updates

There are no configuration options to SoftwareUpdateNotificationManager, and users should not run SoftwareUpdateNotificationManager manually.

4/4/18 Mac OS X
